original_title: Looney Tunes: All Stars Collection - Volume 2
overview: The Looney Tunes Golden Collection was an annual series of six four-disc DVD box sets from Warner Brothers' home video unit Warner Home Video, each containing about 60 Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies animated shorts. The series began in October 2003 and ended in October 2008
title: Looney Tunes: All Stars Collection - Volume 2
